page.title: 09AMENITIES
page.content: There is a regular bus service between Matlock and Chesterfield. Doctors in General Practice have surgeries in Matlock,Chesterfield and Ashover.There is a General Hospital with maternity facilities in Chesterfield. A district nurse attends patients in their homes. Ambulance and Fire Services are based in Matlock.Children of school age are collected from specified points and taken to the appropriate schools in Ashover,Matlock or Chesterfield where there is also a Technical College for students of further education.There is a Mobile Library service but few shops. Recreation consists of outdoor pursuits:-Hang Gliding, walking, pony trekking and motor cycle trials.
